website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Xperia XZ Premium is a powerful unlocked phone that combines a vivid 4K HDR display with the latest Snapdragon processor and strong audio capabilities, but falls short in other areas.
cons: Fingerprint sensor not activated in US

customer_reviews.title: The one that deserve all the credit for real
customer_reviews.text: It’s simply the best. Despite all the big flagships war in the market now but if you want the real deal, not just the extreme design or the very much unnecessary features. I left the xperia before but I don’t think I can do it again after this gorgeous full package.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone, awesome seller!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for almost a month now and I must say this is an awesome phone. It may not be a behemoth in terms of RAM or body to screen ratio like its counterparts but man this phone is fabulous. Looks amazing and is super smooth in functioning. Above all, the camera and screen quality are really good.One downside, a front flash would have been great. Received it within a week of ordering, Thanks to Techno Needs Store. P.S. My affection for Xperia might have something to do with my first Xperia purchase Xperia SP, few years back.
customer_reviews.author: Animesh Kumar Jha

customer_reviews.title: It's a reasonable phone
customer_reviews.text: + it's a great phone for the price. Reasonable camera, very good screen, speakers are good too. Battery is amazing, can last 2 days depends on the usage. Sony's customer service is good enough - The shape of the phone is a bit unusual. I like the design, but you will need a big pocket for it. System can be crashing sometimes, but I think it happens to every phone these days. Only single camera,
customer_reviews.author: Adam Varga

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mobile Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mobile phone. The best. Sony have used their expertise in electronics to produce a truly stunning phone. Thus far I cannot find anything negative to say about this phone except that it is a must to buy a phone cover and screen protector. Also a word to the wise. Do not pay too much heed to the negative comments about this phone. I recommend this phone with absolute no hesitation. Don't waste your money on phones now costing over a wallet shaking seven hundred pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the phone, by far the most flexible phone I have ever had without all the bloat of a manufacturers skin and apps. Camera is amazing, and is even better now that phone is on Orio software.
customer_reviews.author: CI Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4K HDR REMOTE PLAY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone as it is just bursting with awesome quality. The screen and camera are incredible. Connecting it to my PS4 and using it as remote play Is flawless. Best phone I've had. And I'm an iPhone user.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Murray

customer_reviews.title: Everything as posted in the package.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting used to it. It's everything as described by Sony and more. The quality of image and sound and the camera is amazing. I haven't figured out how to use everything. The battery life is very long even when you spend your time playing video's.
customer_reviews.author: César De Barros

customer_reviews.title: Feels, looks and functions like quality
customer_reviews.text: This felt like quality from the moment I took out of the box. Love the finger print scan location (on the side of the device) and high quality camera (already been complimented on a night shot). Not too much bloating software. And the Sony video creator software that does come with if is actually quite neat. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John Thoresen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, as described, excellent 4k quality, cameras are really good, loads of storage space, still working perfectly, been dropped a few times & unlike the crappy iphones the screen hasn't shattered into a million pieces.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best phone for the price, excellent performance few Complains finger Print scanner losses abit of its accuracy when case is applied, so side fingre print scanner is a bad idea, and its old design for 2017 Flagship, same design from xperia z1 of 2013, it looks very outdated in 2018 world of full screen Flagships
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret buying it.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty amazing. Have it since January 2018 and I don't regret getting at all. Its still super fast, camera is amazing, screen, battery, size is all amazing too. the fingerprint scanner is placed so well and it has a headphone jack. I know nothing is perfect but I give this phone 10/10 in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Silva

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a Deal for a Phone Like This!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Android smartphones I've ever used. It is such a great phone. The screen is very clear, the colours are very bright and vivid. The 4K isn't always on but if you're watching a 4K video you do notice the difference even on a phone screen. The front facing speakers aren't the loudest but sound very clear and the surround is pretty effective. The camera is incredible. Takes amazing photos and videos and the 960 fps super slow motion is awesome (tho you need to be in a bright environment for that). The phone feels fast and snappy to use. I would seriously recommend this phone. Couldn't be more happier.
customer_reviews.author: Giedrius Jarmala

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my husbands Birthday. And after two weeks bought one for myself. It's amazing! I love everything about this phone. Battery life is great!! Sound is loud and clear, big screen, amazing colours and camera is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lukssa

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent phone, it is a bit bigger than i expected, and obviously doesnt have all the refinements of the top models. But i only want it for light web browsing and to use as a phone which it does well. wouldnt recommend for people into their music though, as the sound is only average.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID  H

customer_reviews.title: Good smartphone
customer_reviews.text: A very good smartphone especially for battery life screen size which is 5.5 inches also a good 19mp camera fast and responsive and lastly toughened gorilla glass you just need to buy a rubberized phone case for it as it is very slippy to hold like an iphone
customer_reviews.author: paul parkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition bar one scratch on the back
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition bar one scratch on the back, was delivered quick and at a very reasonable price. Would recommend the company to anyone, The phone is a massive upgrade in my opinion from the Z5 and is better in every way.
customer_reviews.author: kurt moxham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality device.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. Screen and camera is just superb. Running Android 8.0 Oreo and its just fantastic. Coming from an iPhone 6Plus, its just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone and alternative to the mainstream
customer_reviews.text: Sony's phones have taken a backstep in the market share but this was in my opinion the phone that tried to reignite interest. Flagship 835 soc which is still quick and responsive in 2019, first 4k display, stereo speakers, brilliant camera even though there's no ois. Only thing that truly lets the phone down is its 16:9 aspect ratio leading to huge bezels and width.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best phone I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best phone I have used. The screen is great, and a quick change in the settings means the colours are rich and brilliant. The camera is amazing, the slow-motion capture is fun and easy to use, and the phone generally lives up to its "Premium" name.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: The photos are like looking at it in real life
customer_reviews.text: It's so quick. The photos are like looking at it in real life. I was shocked at the quality and after having phone and phone year after year I wasent often impressed any longer. This phone is really set apart from all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Terry and Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she seems happy with the phone. Usually buy Sony products, no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S A Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good fast phone.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this after a few months. Good battery and screen. Moved to this after a Samsung and have not been disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andy from Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleak phone
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit scruff mark on side but not fussed Pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best Xperia phone I've ever had. Brilliant at everything. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davenport

customer_reviews.title: The best phone on the market in November 2018
customer_reviews.text: Having read many reviews and undertaking much deliberation, I decided to divorce Samsung after many years, and 3 battery failures.. and go for Sony.. And was absolutely stunned.. So many good points, too much to list.. it is truely an incredible bit of kit.. no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Ravingmadferret

customer_reviews.title: Just fan-bloody-tastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, perfect functionality and a pleasure to use. Can't find anything to moan about I am truly shocked at how much I love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hob

customer_reviews.title: Heavily damaged and false quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought one second hand listed as "very good" quality on here. Unfortunately the outer case is quite damaged and several external buttons don't work. As well as there being scratches on the screen itself. I don't see how this can be listed as very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality handset
customer_reviews.text: Worth the upgrade from Z3. Camera excellent but not many modes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, even after a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had my phone for a year now and it hasn't slowed down one bit! I still love it so much. A the little features like the battery life has really helped and the camera is still really good. So glad I purchased from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: ... with the phone and so far it has been great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had about a month with the phone and so far it has been great!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Will recommend this phone everyday!!! Fell from 3rd floor and nothing happened to it. Very good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: ruphina

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, second one. 4k screen is amazing, lightening fast.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Mackie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Just getting used to it. Always buy Sony and always from amazon
customer_reviews.author: bobbyashworth

customer_reviews.title: Sony phone
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing about the phone, but the battery life is not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.author: R J

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. Shame I received wrong charger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Camera and video amazing. Only fault is, I received the wrong cable for charging.
customer_reviews.author: pj o connor

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Service from Techhut
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Service from Techhut, quick delivery and a really good price!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Big.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice phone but be warned it's big and heavy. I also purchased the LOVE MEI rugged case so it is even bigger. Struggle to get it in your pocket. As this replaced an Xeperia Z3 I thought the Sony transfer app would be deam. It wasn't. Spent hours uploading and downloading data only to find most of it wasn't there. Disappointing Sony has left out the on-phone answering machine and it is not available to add. If you have a Z3 think very carefully before you upgrade. They are still the best.
customer_reviews.author: Wiser Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Music stereo is life like, (so says the manufacturer) Good quality music player
customer_reviews.text: Phone is grand. Huge. Music stereo is life like, (so says the manufacturer) Good quality music player. Good for Apps like Spotify and Youtube. The screen sometimes seems darker than other androids but is not an immediate issue. Now although, I would buy a small phone. Perhaps the Sony - XZ1 Compact. Good purchase. I bought a second hand one for 200. Seems brand new.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Wow So much better than my previous phones, the Z3 and Z3+, which were a huge dissapointment. I am so happy I stuck with Sony Xperia. The phone has a super quick processor, the operating system is still surprising me and the camera is fantastic. My faith in Sony has been restored.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Driver

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone by a mile
customer_reviews.text: What a great phone. The best choice have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: nick smith

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery .
customer_reviews.text: Performance is excellent, Camera button gets in the way, A case is an absolute must, it's as slippery as a block of ice.
customer_reviews.author: TOONEND

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Brought only a few days ago. Battery life ain't good and it heats up only after half an hours use.
customer_reviews.author: Niru Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good phone, a bit disappointed with the camera though.
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: Like a Volvo it is big
customer_reviews.text: If this phone were a car it would be a cross between a Ferrari and a Volvo. Like a Volvo it is big, boxy, heavy and good. Like a Ferrari it is beautiful and fast. The screen is the best screen I have seen on a phone. Awesome. It has two day battery life if you are careful. The only thing that is not amazing is the camera which is good but shows a lot of digital noise. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Over rated
customer_reviews.text: The unit is too big and clumberson and unlike other models the screen is much smaller than the unit. The WiFi sometimes just stops working and the screen sometimes fails in a sort of pixelated way. Wish I'd have spent more and gone for a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mister-Pink

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece volume defective as it was so low. I am not one to write reviews but this is the basic primary function of a mobile. Was bought directly from Amazon Dec 2017. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Super Tester

customer_reviews.title: Sony xz premium brief review
customer_reviews.text: The only real good thing about this phone is the screens picture clarity & 4k. But, I still prefer my old iPhone 6s plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sirina

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone: ) but Super slow motion mode is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone :) but Super slow motion mode is really bad in the low light room (a lot of noise on the screen) and sometime finger print isn't working well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift but the ring tone/alert/alarm sounds are very soft. If you put it in your pocket, it is virtually impossible to hear it!! There is an option from Sony to send the phone back to them to fix the sound but I am not prepared to do this as this is a brand new phone, I should not have to go through all this and expect it to work adequately.Worst Sony model I ever bought - really do hope they improve in their next model!!.
customer_reviews.author: yu wing fung - chiu keung fung

customer_reviews.title: but not happy that the screen is only 1080p
customer_reviews.text: The bezels are too large, the screen image is very bright, but not happy that the screen is only 1080p, it should have been at least 1440 x 2880 pixels or the equivalent for the screen size. Surely Sony could have added the option to change this in the settings the same as the Galaxy S8. Speakers are good quality it seems. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Premium means premium !
customer_reviews.text: A pleasing slightly industrial design, with great screen, really good speaker and phone performance and a brilliant camera; what else could you want ? Better than a Galaxy S8 with it's fiddly unresolved edges that are an annoying distraction in every day use. I've gone for Sony and I'd recommend that you try it too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Walker

customer_reviews.title: Does everything the former did but better, faster and smoother
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Z3. Does everything the former did but better, faster and smoother. Love the extra internal memory and the finger print reader on the on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: philb1964

customer_reviews.title: What a phone
customer_reviews.text: awesome phone. 4k screen is a joy to behold, it IS noticable. . loses 2 stars because of sound issues! plugging in a headset with mic ... callers cant hear me very loud, despite any settings. this issue extends to the handset mic .. it also has issues and so again, people cant hear me clearly/loudly. . this 'smartphone' is awesome for everything except for being an actual 'phone'
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: i love the camera on this phone gives very high quality ...
customer_reviews.text: i love the camera on this phone gives very high quality pictures weather selfies or main pictures video quality is also excellent if you considering purchasing this phone i would recommend getting a high speed micro sd card like SanDisk Extreme 128GB microSDXC Memory Card + SD Adapter up to 100MB/s, Class 10, U3, V30 A1 - FFP it will help with the transfer speeds and app performance.
customer_reviews.author: Klam man

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Moved from IPhone to android (this phone) and I've never looked back. It's fast, the camera is amazing and the battery genuinely lasts all day. As for the 4k Screen Feature and 960fps slow motion camera... I don't use them. They are a bit of a gimmick in my opinion, but overall it's a great phone. If you have any questions, I'll try to answer them. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Kian K.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed would sum up this purchase. This is my 2nd Sony Xperia XZ Premium. The previous one, which I loved, was more than 3 years old. An empty box was delivered and photographed in situ on the doorstep. I then had to chase the delivery driver and persuade him to search the van for the missing phone... The volume button on the phone isn't working and the colour display is poor in comparison to the previous version of the same phone. Lesson learnt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best android phone ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Android phones for the past years and I have to say this is the best phone I've ever had - brilliant 4K display, amazing speed, beautifully designed (the deepsea black changes into a blue-ish colour under the sunlight!), excellent camera. This is one of the best purchase I've had and many thanks to Sony for creating such an impressive product! It's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, the sound is a little quieter than I would like but I have had that problem with a previous xz so seems to be standard for that type of phn but otherwise have no complaints, it does everything it should do quite well, would recommend this phn, it came quickly and was a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy s

customer_reviews.title: Under productive
customer_reviews.text: Finger print reader very poor, battery life mid range. Screen ok. I wasn't very happy with the product. Had to change it for an alternative with 10 days. Of its time, not great for 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Max DS

customer_reviews.title: A solid phone
customer_reviews.text: A good phone purchased at a great price. My previous phone was a Z3 which is more than 4 years old but still going strong. I am hoping I can get the same amount of years from the XZ Premium
customer_reviews.author: Haadiyy

customer_reviews.title: Crapp.
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend to buy from this seller. The photos of the phone is good also grades as B which means good condition but it came with a lot and very deep scratches on the back so it is not good condition at all. You can see very clearly in the pictures awful condition
customer_reviews.author: Madars

customer_reviews.title: Hanging on the telephone.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant been waiting for one of these for a while. Screen had a little scratch that buffer out with screen paste. Great value for money powerful phone super battery life nice size for games and general tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone to replace my x5 premium. Exactly as described by seller. Promptly shipped. Great price. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone.
customer_reviews.text: If you like Sony phones, you know what to expect. It's top model, very high specs, superb camera (main reason to buy). Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Soltysiak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone which I bought as a replacement for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone which I bought as a replacement for my previous Xperia phone which I was always pleased with but due to age the battery had started to run out very quickly. Display and camera are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony XZ Premium
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great mobile as a replacement for my Sony Z2! Could never fault Sony for any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Les R

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Really a well made handset! Edit: almost 2 years on and this is still in daily use, solid build quality and exceptional stability of the software make this an amazing phone handset.
customer_reviews.author: Brummie J

customer_reviews.title: Phone Home
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived promptly. Phone is good as brand new. I like phone very much. Phone x
customer_reviews.author: Brio

customer_reviews.title: Good device, but box was unsealed
customer_reviews.text: Good performance and visually pleasing. My only issue is the phone box that in comes in was unsealed which leads me to believe that the device isn't exactly brand new as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Luke T.

customer_reviews.title: Best choice.
customer_reviews.text: I've previously had Sony xperia Z1 for over 4 years and now got Xperia Premium, best phones ever. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: wow what a great phone and I was lucky to get this at a good price amazon seem to great low prices
customer_reviews.author: Martyn wheadon

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Deal
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in immaculate condition and a fantastic bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Britain

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, recipient was very pleased with it. Very good phone.
customer_reviews.author: jomutheone

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I bought this phone
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this phone. Amazing camera and features. Very fast phone and the fingerprint works a lot better than the previous iPhone I had.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana C.

customer_reviews.title: slightly better than my previous model and I think it better ...
customer_reviews.text: slightly better than my previous model and I think it better than paying through the phone providers going to go sim only
customer_reviews.author: Celiaanddon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great phone well priced the wife was well pleased 😂
customer_reviews.author: big jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone with Software Android Bluetooth Bug
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Only thing I can't find is the morning timed settings to switch on wifi, bluetooth etc as er the Z1. Update: Had it a while now Android Nougat 7.1.1 does not work for bluetooth. Car connects and you can make calls & receive them but it disconnects after about 2 mins after every connection. Sony know about it & say it will be fixed - but when???????. I would not have bought it with this bug. Wish I'd researched better as the internet is littered with android 7.0 onward bluetooth problems. Basically I would not advise moving to this product if you need bluetooth in car.
customer_reviews.author: BigMart

customer_reviews.title: Top phone
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Xperia XZ Premium has everything you want when paying top money for a phone, with its 4K display and slow motion camera two standout party pieces. Sony has done a good job of keeping up with the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco Di Via

customer_reviews.title: ... had been assured was being delivered I would have loved it but it was a single sim version so ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this been the dual sim version as I had been assured was being delivered I would have loved it but it was a single sim version so was returned
customer_reviews.author: Mr H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought Sony because I want good audio and visual features like the camera and screen. It delivers on all fronts. It's also blindingly fast, and has excellent reception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast with a super camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent smartphone. My second Sony Xperia. It looks smart, has an excellent camera front and rear, performs really fast. The only slightly negative observation to date is that even on very modest use the battery requires charging every two days at a minimum. From a features and performance perspective probably still the best value for money at present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for over 6 months. Its brilliant. Last phone was an Xperia z3, which lasted ages and was also brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: B. Potter

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia XZ Premium 64 GB 5.5-Inch UK SIM-Free Smartphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:XZ Premium

NEW SONY XPERIA XZ PREMIUM SMARTPHONE WITH 64GB INTERNAL MEMORY AND 5.5 INCH TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY IN BLACK
The Motion Eye camera puts decades of Sony innovation in your hand, letting you capture life in ways no other smartphone can. It’s built using know-how from our Alpha and Cyber-shot ranges, for images and videos that are simply incredible to see.

Using Sony BRAVIA TV technology, the Xperia XZ Premium plays 4K HDR content that’s so clear and lifelike, it takes your breath away.

With Super slow motion and Predictive capture, the Motion Eye camera lets you experience more than the human eye can see. It uses faster and smarter processing than ever before, for exceptional image quality and our best motion detection technology yet.

The Xperia XZ Premium does all its thinking with the cutting-edge Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processor. It integrates Gigabit-class connectivity with the X16 modem, and delivers stunning graphics, one of the industry-leading performances, and enhanced battery efficiency.



BOX CONTAINS
Mobile, USB cable, plug
feature_bullets: Please note that Sony XZ Premium 'Dispatched from and sold by Amazon' are Single SIM UK Models.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
